5. From point 4, we know that the person driving the taxi is on the right of the person driving the jet-ski. The only possible arrangement that satisfies this condition is if Taxi is in the 2nd position and Jet-ski is in the 1st position.

6. Now we have the positions of Fanta and Taxi fixed. Since there's only one position left for Cycling and Surfing, Surfing must be in the 1st position and Cycling in the 4th position.

7. Finally, since the person drinking Coffee (Fanta in the original arrangement) is watching spy movies, the person drinking Fanta (now in the 2nd position) must be watching Crime movies.

The final solution table is:
